original_text:
Lara Jones is Cleopatra
Sei cresciuto giocando a Tomb Raider e amavi i film di Indiana Jones? Allora questa macchina  è per te! Durante il lancio di questa slot gratis, Spearhead Studios ha dichiarato che Lara Jones is Cleopatra segue le gesta della sua omonima avventuriera, impegnata nella ricerca dei preziosi tesori nascosti nelle profondità della tomba della regina egiziana Cleopatra. Ha inoltre aggiunto, che la slot è stata ottimizzata per i dispositivi mobili ed è disponibile in una vasta gamma di valute e lingue nei casinò online certificati dalle autorità di regolamentazione in tutte le principali giurisdizioni, inclusa l’Italia. Continua a leggere per scoprire la trama e i trucchi di questo avventuroso gioco online!
Trama di Lara Jones
Lara Croft incontra Indiana Jones, ecco cosa puoi aspettarti da questo gioco! Lara Jones Is Cleopatra è una slot gratis a tema avventura di Spearhead Studios che ti porta in un viaggio in Egitto. La grafica di questa slot sembra raffinata e include icone piccole e di alta qualità, bobine fatte di blocchi di sabbia, un tempio usato come matrice e uno sfondo dove puoi trovare il deserto, le piramidi e gli uccelli animati.
Gameplay ed elementi principali
Lara Jones Is Cleopatra ha 5 rulli e 10 linee di pagamento con una vincita massima che si aggira intorno a 17.000x. Il gioco ha un RTP del 96,46%. In questa macchina troverai 9 simboli regolari:

un serpente,
cinque simboli di carte da gioco,
l’occhio di Horus,
Cleopatra
uno scarabeo.

La stessa Lara Jones ha il ruolo di un simbolo jolly. Può sostituire simboli regolari purché possa aiutare un giocatore a completare una linea vincente. Se ottieni tre simboli Scatter ovunque sul primo, terzo e quinto rullo, lancerai dieci giri gratuiti. Durante i giri gratuiti, il simbolo jolly si trasforma in un jolly appiccicoso che rimane in posizione fino alla fine di questa modalità speciale.
Aspettati vincite fenomenali!
Lara Jones Is Cleopatra offre vincite a linea singola fino a 3.000 volte la puntata iniziale ed è in grado di innescare il bonus di rotazione Cleopatra. Con questo gioco, gli appassionati hanno la possibilità di ritirare premi in denaro che superano i 30.000€. Questa video slot HTML5 di alta qualità è stata progettata per essere riprodotta su desktop e su qualsiasi dispositivo mobile, per rendere le tue partite ancora più emozionanti. Scopri nel nostro catalogogli altri titoli disponibili di questo innovativo sviluppatore, giocabili anche in modalità demo, per chi non è ancora esperto.

raw_translation.response:
Are you a lover of Tomb Raider and Indiana Jones movies? Then this machine is for you! The free slot "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" by Spearhead Studios follows in the footsteps of its eponymous adventurer, engaged in the search for precious treasures hidden in the depths of the tomb of the Egyptian queen Cleopatra. The slot has been optimized for mobile devices and is available in a wide range of currencies and languages in online casinos certified by regulatory authorities in all major jurisdictions, including Italy. 

The graphics of this adventure-themed slot are refined and include small, high-quality icons, sand-block reels, a temple used as a matrix, and a background where you can find the desert, pyramids, and animated birds. With 5 reels and 10 paylines, this slot has a maximum payout of around 17,000x and an RTP of 96.46%. The regular symbols include a snake, five card symbols, the Eye of Horus, Cleopatra, and a scarab. The protagonist, Lara Jones, plays the role of a wild symbol and can replace regular symbols as long as it can help a player complete a winning line. 

If you get three scatter symbols anywhere on the first, third, and fifth reel, you will launch ten free spins. During the free spins, the wild symbol turns into a sticky wild that remains in position until the end of this special mode. Expect phenomenal winnings with "Lara Jones is Cleopatra," with single line wins up to 3,000 times the initial bet, and a chance to trigger the Cleopatra spinning bonus. 

This high-quality HTML5 video slot has been designed to be played on desktop and any mobile device, making your gaming experience even more exciting. Check out other available titles from this innovative developer in our catalog, also playable in demo mode for those who are not yet experienced in gambling.

Are you a Tomb Raider or Indiana Jones fan? Then this is the machine for you! Spearhead Studios has launched the free slot game "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" which follows the adventures of the famous adventurer herself, as she searches for the precious treasure hidden deep within the tomb of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra. This exciting slot game has been optimized for mobile devices and is available in a wide range of currencies and languages on online casinos certified by regulatory authorities in all major jurisdictions, including Italy. Keep reading to discover the plot and tricks of this adventurous online game!

Plot of Lara Jones

Lara Croft meets Indiana Jones - that's what you can expect from this game! "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" is a free adventure-themed slot game from Spearhead Studios that takes you on a journey to Egypt. The graphics of this slot game are sophisticated and include high-quality, small icons, sand-block reels, a temple used as a matrix, and a background that features the desert, pyramids, and animated birds.

Gameplay and Key Elements

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" has 5 reels and 10 paylines with a maximum win of around 17,000x. The game has an RTP of 96.46%. In this machine, you'll find nine regular symbols:

- A snake
- Five playing card symbols
- The Eye of Horus
- Cleopatra
- A scarab beetle.

Lara Jones herself plays the role of a wild symbol. She can replace regular symbols as long as she can help a player complete a winning line. If you get three scatter symbols anywhere on the first, third, and fifth reels, you'll trigger ten free spins. During free spins, the wild symbol transforms into a sticky wild that remains in place until the end of this special mode.

Expect Phenomenal Wins!

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" offers single-line wins of up to 3,000 times the initial bet and can trigger the Cleopatra rotation bonus. With this game, fans have the chance to win cash prizes that exceed €30,000. This high-quality HTML5 video slot is designed to be played on desktop and any mobile device, making your games even more exciting. Discover in our catalog other available titles from this innovative developer, which can also be played in demo mode for those who are not yet experienced.

Review: Are you a Tomb Raider or Indiana Jones fan? Then this is the machine for you! Spearhead Studios has launched the free slot game "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" which follows the adventures of the famous adventurer herself, as she searches for the precious treasure hidden deep within the tomb of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra. This exciting slot game has been optimized for mobile devices and is available in a wide range of currencies and languages on online casinos certified by regulatory authorities in all major jurisdictions, including Italy. Keep reading to discover the plot and tricks of this adventurous online game!

Plot of Lara Jones

Lara Croft meets Indiana Jones - that's what you can expect from this game! "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" is a free adventure-themed slot game from Spearhead Studios that takes you on a journey to Egypt. The graphics of this slot game are sophisticated and include high-quality, small icons, sand-block reels, a temple used as a matrix, and a background that features the desert, pyramids, and animated birds.

Gameplay and Key Elements

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" has 5 reels and 10 paylines with a maximum win of around 17,000x. The game has an RTP of 96.46%. In this machine, you'll find nine regular symbols:

- A snake
- Five playing card symbols
- The Eye of Horus
- Cleopatra
- A scarab beetle.

Lara Jones herself plays the role of a wild symbol. She can replace regular symbols as long as she can help a player complete a winning line. If you get three scatter symbols anywhere on the first, third, and fifth reels, you'll trigger ten free spins. During free spins, the wild symbol transforms into a sticky wild that remains in place until the end of this special mode.

Expect Phenomenal Wins!

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" offers single-line wins of up to 3,000 times the initial bet and can trigger the Cleopatra rotation bonus. With this game, fans have the chance to win cash prizes that exceed €30,000. This high-quality HTML5 video slot is designed to be played on desktop and any mobile device, making your games even more exciting. Discover in our catalog other available titles from this innovative developer, which can also be played in demo mode for those who are not yet experienced.

Plot of Lara Jones

Lara Croft meets Indiana Jones - that's what you can expect from this game! "Lara Jones is Cleopatra" is a free adventure-themed slot game from Spearhead Studios that takes you on a journey to Egypt. The graphics of this slot game are sophisticated and include high-quality, small icons, sand-block reels, a temple used as a matrix, and a background that features the desert, pyramids, and animated birds.

Gameplay and Key Elements

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" has 5 reels and 10 paylines with a maximum win of around 17,000x. The game has an RTP of 96.46%. In this machine, you'll find nine regular symbols:

- A snake
- Five playing card symbols
- The Eye of Horus
- Cleopatra
- A scarab beetle.

Lara Jones herself plays the role of a wild symbol. She can replace regular symbols as long as she can help a player complete a winning line. If you get three scatter symbols anywhere on the first, third, and fifth reels, you'll trigger ten free spins. During free spins, the wild symbol transforms into a sticky wild that remains in place until the end of this special mode.

Expect Phenomenal Wins!

"Lara Jones is Cleopatra" offers single-line wins of up to 3,000 times the initial bet and can trigger the Cleopatra rotation bonus. With this game, fans have the chance to win cash prizes that exceed €30,000. This high-quality HTML5 video slot is designed to be played on desktop and any mobile device, making your games even more exciting. Discover in our catalog other available titles from this innovative developer, which can also be played in demo mode for those who are not yet experienced.
